footer.context: Gamma Nu Eta is the National Information Technology Honor Society, and was founded to recognize and promote excellence in the study and the leadership of Information Technology, to offer knowledge and services to members' schools and the surrounding communities, and to play an active role in the application and evolution of Information Technology within society.
footer.address: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute Information Technology and Web Science, Gamma Nu Eta, Lally 102, Troy, NY 12180.
